name: Golden Vault
description: As long as you have at least [effect0.power][coin], lose [effect0.power][coin] when you take Pyre damage in combat instead of taking damage.
relicLoreTooltips: We amassed what small gold we had over time, all of it plundered from the rarely-defeated Heavenly forces in hopes of stifling their war funding. Given the great wealth of Heaven, however, I don’t imagine they even noticed. It’s funny how quickly the afraid will empty their pockets in the off chance of retaining some control of their sanity.
